title: mdbx_setup_dxb:15019 filesize mismatch on ropsten
body:
Not sure if it is a bug, feel free to close if it is not.

It's been a while I didn't sync my ropsten node, today I decided to sync it again to the tip and found a strange message on start:

`mdbx_setup_dxb:15019 filesize mismatch (expect 363919585280b/88847555p, have 365072220160b/89128960p)`

Full startup log below. Erigon v2021.11.03.

```
INFO[11-28|06:57:28.812] Build info                               git_branch=trace-api git_tag=v2021.11.03 git_commit=31441d11d56d3464f8a838ce191ba14677d5f36f
INFO[11-28|06:57:28.812] Starting Erigon on Ropsten testnet...
INFO[11-28|06:57:28.816] Maximum peer count                       ETH=100 total=100
INFO[11-28|06:57:28.816] Set global gas cap                       cap=50000000
INFO[11-28|06:57:28.820] Opening Database                         label=chaindata path=/Volumes/ropsten-erigon-data/chaindata
mdbx_setup_dxb:15019 filesize mismatch (expect 363919585280b/88847555p, have 365072220160b/89128960p)
INFO[11-28|06:57:38.617] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Constantinople: 4230000 Petersburg: 4939394 Istanbul: 6485846, Muir Glacier: 7117117, Berlin: 9812189, London: 10499401, Arrow Glacier: <nil>, Engine: ethash}"
INFO[11-28|06:57:38.617] Disk storage enabled for ethash DAGs     dir=/Volumes/ropsten-erigon-data/ethash-dags count=2
INFO[11-28|06:57:38.617] Initialising Ethereum protocol           network=3
INFO[11-28|06:57:38.617] Effective                                prune="--prune="
INFO[11-28|06:57:41.772] Starting private RPC server              on=127.0.0.1:9090
INFO[11-28|06:57:41.772] [1/15 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=10961594
INFO[11-28|06:57:41.826] Started P2P networking                   version=65 self=enode://be36b5536cb67368036faad9418d0ea3dcfa9e1823a6c9608e1a596f0462e6263f338dc8a824ce5451794b997985849cd5dd1f4d09667ff71e68de35314870cd@127.0.0.1:30304 name=erigon/v2021.11.3-beta-31441d11/darwin-amd64/go1.17.2
INFO[11-28|06:57:41.847] Started P2P networking                   version=66 self=enode://be36b5536cb67368036faad9418d0ea3dcfa9e1823a6c9608e1a596f0462e6263f338dc8a824ce5451794b997985849cd5dd1f4d09667ff71e68de35314870cd@127.0.0.1:30303 name=erigon/v2021.11.3-beta-31441d11/darwin-amd64/go1.17.2
INFO[11-28|06:58:11.773] [1/15 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=10961594 blk/second=0.000 alloc="216.09 MiB" sys="298.13 MiB"
```

It is follow by tons of:

```
WARN[11-28|07:01:53.787] Invalidating anchor for suspected unavailability height=11089274
WARN[11-28|07:02:07.094] Invalidating anchor for suspected unavailability height=10963130
WARN[11-28|07:02:07.094] Invalidating anchor for suspected unavailability height=10964666
```

like messages.

I'll let you know if it is progressing, will let it running on background.
It means service was shutdown non-gracefully last time. But itâ€™s not a problem. Just some db log visible on current log level
